players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. We should vote her out today to protect the town."
Diana: "I’m not the mafioso, Bob! Your quick accusation makes me suspicious of you—maybe you're trying to deflect."
Charlie: "I think we should hear more from both before voting. Bob, why do you suspect Diana so quickly?"
You: "I stand by my investigation—Diana is the mafioso. Charlie, trust me; voting her out saves us all."
Diana: "Diana is the mafioso. We should vote her out today to protect the town."
Charlie: "I think Bob might be the detective, so I'll go with voting for Diana today."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
